game.trade

Class Trade

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.trade.Trade

  • public class Trade
extends java.lang.Object
    class that contains variables for trade offers, requests, the player and the trade-id so that the client controller can produce an instance of this class for each individual trade which helps with the communication between the different players
    Author:
    Svenja Schoett

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Trade()
      Trade constructor without parameters, so that it can be created at the start of the game when no trade exists.
      Trade(int tradeID, Resources tradeOffer, Resources tradeRequest, Player player)
      Constructor for the trade class
